article.title: Conley Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text: William G. Conley has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy director, electronic warfare,Â Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
